text.text_translated:
Graffiti is drawing or writing on walls.  
People have drawn on walls for a long time.  
In very old times, people in Africa drew animal pictures.  
People in Europe also drew animal pictures.  
They also drew pictures of people in caves.  
Archaeologists have found graffiti on old buildings in Greece.  
They have found graffiti on old buildings in Italy.  
They have also found in Syria and Iraq.  
They have found many graffiti pieces in the Roman town of Pompeii.  
In Pompeii, people wrote the graffiti in Latin.  
The messages were about gods.  
Some messages were about people in charge.  
Some messages were about love.  
Some messages were about magic words.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Graffiti is writing or drawing on walls.  
People painted and wrote on walls for a long time.  
Long ago, people in Africa and Europe painted animals and people in caves.  
Graffiti was found on old buildings in Greece, Italy, Syria, and Iraq.  
In the Roman town of Pompeii, archaeologists found many graffiti in Latin.  
They wrote messages about religion, politics, love, and some magic spells.
